name: Go Drill
description:
Dig! Upgrade! Explore!

Want to explore the mysterious under world? Download and try this game. Hundreds treasures await you. Become the greatest explorers. Let's Go! Drive your super digging machine to get them!

Features:

* Simple and fun gameplay
* 6 super drilling machine to unlock
* Hundreds of mysterious treasures
* 3 world maps
* Free to play

How to play

Swipe to control the machine, and collect as many as treasures as your way up. Upgrade your power for giant treasures.
